basics.name: Mavin Sao
basics.summary: Cambodian Master's student in Data Science at Chonnam National University with expertise in NLP, deep learning, and LLMs. Focused on classification models, topic modeling, and empathic computing.

work.name: NLP Research Lab, Chonnam National University
work.summary: Advanced research in Natural Language Processing (NLP), specializing in classification, topic modeling, model interpretability, and transformer architectures.

publications.name: MIRoBERTa: Mental Illness Text Classification With Transfer Learning on Subreddits
publications.summary: This paper introduces MIRoBERTa, a RoBERTa-based model adapted for mental health domain via transfer learning on Reddit data. Achieves state-of-the-art performance in multiclass classification.

publications.name: Personalized E-Learning Course Recommendations: A Chatbot Approach Using LangChain
publications.summary: A LangChain-powered chatbot for personalized e-learning course recommendations using private datasets and RAG architecture.

presentations.name: Personalized E-Learning Course Recommendations: A Chatbot Approach Using LangChain
presentations.description: Presented an AI-powered chatbot system using LangChain and RAG to recommend personalized e-learning courses through a Streamlit interface.

teaching.description: Delivered basic and advanced courses in web design and mobile application development with tools like React Native and Docker.

portfolio.name: Mental Health Text Classification
